name: Rib & Infill Installation
Pre-commencement
Ribs inspected on arrival and correct (length, width, size/shape) as per design/shop drawings and damage free
Rib lifting plan confirmed, correct chains and hooks verified.
Infill boards inspected on arrival. No knots, no cracks or other weaknesses across 25% of the width.
Propping layout confirmed as "issued for construction" and attached.
Area cleared for propping to be
Structural Steel Brackets fitted and fixed (correct height and as per design)
Propping/Falseworks
Floor area cleared for propping to be erected.
Props tagged and fixings as per approved design.
U Head brackets rotated to support bearers, bearers clipped to U head brackets.
All back propping completed, checked and approved as per design
Rib Installation
Inspect against rib install and propping layout drawings. Mark up hard copy drawings accordingly and upload to this checkpoint to verify the specification has been met.
No visual damage to ribs
Foreman Sign off to receive Rib Installation inspection results. Pass this checkpoint after sending the email.
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
Infill Panel Installation
Infill boards tightly constructed as panels, including 'backbone', 6 to 10 boards in length.
Infill panels fitted tightly between ribs.
Infill panel adjacent ends are joined.
Infill panels locked with timber blocks to prevent lateral movement.
Infill boards secured to wall supports
No obvious visual defects on infill boards, no knots, no cracks or other weakness across 25% of the width.
All gaps filled, infills installed, PF rod/expanding foam installed (No gaps)
Foreman Sign off to receive Infill Panel Installation inspection results. Pass this checkpoint after sending the email.
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
